019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
022import java.util.Optional;
023import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpAddCpu;
024import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpCommand;
025import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpDelCpu;
026import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpQueryHotpluggableCpus;
027import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
028import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
029import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
030
031/**
032 * Signals the reception of a result from executing a QMP command.
033 */
034public class MonitorResult extends Event<Void> {
035
036    private final QmpCommand executed;
037    private final JsonNode response;
038
039    /**
040     * Create event from data.
041     *
042     * @param command the command
043     * @param response the response
044     * @return the monitor result
045     */
046    public static MonitorResult from(QmpCommand command, JsonNode response) {
047        if (command instanceof QmpQueryHotpluggableCpus) {
048            return new HotpluggableCpuStatus(command, response);
049        }
050        if (command instanceof QmpAddCpu) {
051            return new CpuAdded(command, response);
052        }
053        if (command instanceof QmpDelCpu) {
054            return new CpuDeleted(command, response);
055        }
056        return new MonitorResult(command, response);
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * Instantiates a new monitor result.
061     *
062     * @param command the command
063     * @param response the response
064     */
065    protected MonitorResult(QmpCommand command, JsonNode response) {
066        this.executed = command;
067        this.response = response;
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Returns the executed executed.
072     *
073     * @return the executed
074     */
075    public QmpCommand executed() {
076        return executed;
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Returns true if executed has been executed successfully.
081     *
082     * @return true, if successful
083     */
084    public boolean successful() {
085        return response.has("return");
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * Returns the values that come with the response.
090     *
091     * @return the json node
092     */
093    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals")
094    public JsonNode values() {
095        if (response.has("return")) {
096            return response.get("return");
097        }
098        if (response.has("error")) {
099            return response.get("error");
100        }
101        return null;
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Returns the error class if this result is an error.
106     *
107     * @return the optional
108     */
109    public Optional<String> errorClass() {
110        if (!response.has("error")) {
111            return Optional.empty();
112        }
113        return Optional.ofNullable(response.get("error").get("class").asText());
114    }
115
116    /**
117     * Returns the error description if this result is an error.
118     *
119     * @return the optional
120     */
121    public Optional<String> errorDescription() {
122        if (!response.has("error")) {
123            return Optional.empty();
124        }
125        return Optional.ofNullable(response.get("error").get("desc").asText());
126    }
127
128    /**
129     * Combines error class and error description to a string
130     * "class: desc". Returns an empty string is this result is not an error.
131     *
132     * @return the string
133     */
134    public String errorMessage() {
135        if (successful()) {
136            return "";
137        }
138        return errorClass().get() + ": " + errorDescription().get();
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    public String toString() {
143        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
144        builder.append(Components.objectName(this))
145            .append(" [").append(executed).append(", ").append(successful());
146        if (channels() != null) {
147            builder.append(", channels=");
148            builder.append(Channel.toString(channels()));
149        }
150        builder.append(']');
151        return builder.toString();
152    }
153}
